inclusion.criterion: Patient with SS or S-Beta sickle cell disease aged more than 6 years old and less then 20 years old
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Hospitalised since less then 24 hours for severe vaso-occlusive crisis (either peripheric localisation or thoracic crisis) with morphinic requirements according to local pain management protocol
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: With a signed informed consent from the patient or his legal representative if the patient is under 18 years old
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Benefiting of the French social security system
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patient that has already participated in the study
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Oxygen requirements, pneumonia, acute chest syndrome or other condition necessitating non invasive ventilation on admission
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a known history of sickle cell disease and is experiencing severe bone pain. He has been treated with oxycodone without benefit.
